member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication
member.summary: A test implementation of the IClientApplication interface used for writing local tests of Lambda Functions.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication.AppPackageName
member.summary: The application's package name.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication.AppTitle
member.summary: The application's title.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication.AppVersionCode
member.summary: The application's version code.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication.AppVersionName
member.summary: The application's version.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientApplication.InstallationId
member.summary: The application's installation id.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientContext
member.summary: A test implementation of the IClientContext interface used for writing local tests of Lambda Functions.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientContext.Client
member.summary: The client information provided by the AWS Mobile SDK.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientContext.Custom
member.summary: Custom values set by the client application.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestClientContext.Environment
member.summary: Environment information provided by mobile SDK.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestCognitoIdentity
member.summary: A test implementation of the ICognitoIdentity interface used for writing local tests of Lambda Functions.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestCognitoIdentity.IdentityId
member.summary: The Amazon Cognito identity ID.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestCognitoIdentity.IdentityPoolId
member.summary: The Amazon Cognito identity pool ID.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext
member.summary: A test implementation of the ILambdaContext interface used for writing local tests of Lambda Functions.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.AwsRequestId
member.summary: The AWS request ID associated with the request.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.ClientContext
member.summary: Information about the client application and device when invoked through the AWS Mobile SDK.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.FunctionName
member.summary: Name of the Lambda function that is running.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.FunctionVersion
member.summary: The Lambda function version that is executing. If an alias is used to invoke the function, then this will be the version the alias points to.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.Identity
member.summary: Information about the Amazon Cognito identity provider when invoked through the AWS Mobile SDK.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.InvokedFunctionArn
member.summary: The ARN used to invoke this function.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.Logger
member.summary: Lambda logger associated with the Context object. For the TestLambdaContext this is default to the TestLambdaLogger.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.LogGroupName
member.summary: The CloudWatch log group name associated with the invoked function.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.LogStreamName
member.summary: The CloudWatch log stream name for this function execution.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.MemoryLimitInMB
member.summary: Memory limit, in MB, you configured for the Lambda function.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaContext.RemainingTime
member.summary: Remaining execution time till the function will be terminated.

member.name: T:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaLogger
member.summary: An implementation if ILambdaLogger that stores all the messages in a buffer and writes the messages to the console.

member.name: P:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaLogger.Buffer
member.summary: Buffer for all the log messages written to the logger.

member.name: M:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaLogger.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Write log messages to the console and the Buffer without appending a newline terminator.

member.name: M:Amazon.Lambda.TestUtilities.TestLambdaLogger.LogLine(System.String)
member.summary: Write log messages to the console and the Buffer with a newline terminator.
